```python

```

```python
>>> 2*2
4
```

```python
>>> def decorator(f):
...     return f
```

```python
>>> @decorator
... def f(x):
...     pass
>>> 3*3
9
```

some text

```python
>>> print(4*4)
16
```

... echo 'hello'
